Sentencas: During the practical operation of commercial solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), it is significant and urgent to implement a non-destructive and timely diagnosis of performance degradation.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the method, which can completely fulfill the above requirements, is still not available.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study presents a novel approach, the multipoint impedance (MPI) method, which enables in-situ and real-time monitoring of the operating state of commercial SOFCs.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The method involves two critical steps: the determination of characteristic frequencies using the distribution of relaxation time (DRT) and the selection of reference frequencies for calculating impedances.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The reliability of the MPI method is evaluated both theoretically and experimentally.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of theoretical investigation reveal that the MPI method can accurately estimate the resistances of resistance-capacitance (RC) components.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Subsequently, the MPI method is employed to monitor the working state of commercial microtubular SOFCs (MT-SOFCs) during the stability test.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The experimental results show that by using the MPI method, the impact of different electrochemical processes on the durability of MT-SOFCs can be clearly clarified.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Combining the theoretical and experimental studies, it demonstrates that the MPI method can serve as an efficient and simple diagnostic approach for real-time monitoring SOFCs.
Titulo: An efficient multi-point impedance method for real-time monitoring the working state of solid oxide fuel cells
